title: IAlarmStorageListener (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE IAlarmStorageListener EXTENDS __SYSTEM.IQueryInterface
This interface must be implemented by function blocks, that have to be informed
if both new alarms have been written into the alarm storage and existing alarms
have been updated.
Methods:
AlarmAdded
AlarmModified
Structure:
AlarmAdded (Method)
AlarmModified (Method)
